TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationConfiguration extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationConfiguration Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 应用程序以使用 窗体模式。

span.span: Configures an ASP.NET application to use the forms modality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种以编程方式访问和修改 `forms` 配置节中的元素的方法 `authentication` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `forms` element of a configuration `authentication` section. 此类型是包含 、和类型的组的一部分 。This type is part of a group that includes the ,the , and the types. 除集合类型之外的类型将直接影响基础配置标记。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 根据值为的节属性所定义的限制，可以将信息写入配置文件的相关部分 。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在层次结构中不允许在配置文件中写入的任何尝试都会导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 为安全起见，建议使用外部存储库（如数据库）来保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. 此对象可用于访问其成员。You can use this object to access its members. 配置文件将包含如下所示的设置。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. **注意** 如果你使用 `credentials` 部分，请确保遵循 [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))中所述的准则。**Note** If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). 为了实现可伸缩性和更好的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 [保护 ASP.NET 应用](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications) 程序和 [构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序：身份验证、授权和安全通信](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10))。For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications see [Securing Your ASP.NET Application](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/msdn-magazine/2012/january/asp-net-security-securing-your-asp-net-applications) and [Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/msp-n-p/ff649357(v=pandp.10)). 此示例使用 SHA1。This example uses SHA1. 由于与 SHA1 冲突，Microsoft 建议使用 SHA256。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends SHA256. ``` ``` MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As FormsAuthenticationCredentials

summary.span: 获取用户名和密码的 集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of user names and passwords.

value.span: 包含用户名和密码的 集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the user names and passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取要在基于窗体的身份验证过程中使用的用户名和密码。The property gets the user names and passwords to use during forms-based authentication. > [!NOTE] > 如果需要安全性，则应该使用替代方法来存储用户名和密码;例如，在数据库存储区中。When security is required, you should use alternative ways of storing the user names and passwords; for example, in a database store. 如果你决定使用此集合，则应使用提供的加密设施。If you decide to use this collection, you should use the provided encryption facility. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于身份验证 cookie。The is used for the authentication cookies. 此属性对应于的值 。This property corresponds to the value of . `domain`对于窗体身份验证 cookie，此设置将优先于节的属性。This setting will take precedence over the `domain` attribute of the section for forms authentication cookies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableCrossAppRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableCrossAppRedirects : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示通过身份验证的用户是否可以重定向到其他应用程序中的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether authenticated users can be redirected to URLS in other applications.

value.span: 如果通过身份验证的用户可以重定向到其他应用程序中的 URL，则为 true，否则为 false。

span.span: true if authenticated users can be redirected to URLs in other applications; otherwise false.

value.span: 默认值为 false。

span.span: The default is false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值设置 `forms` 配置的身份验证部分中部分的 enableCrossAppRedirects 属性。The property value sets the enableCrossAppRedirects attribute of the `forms` section in the authentication section of a configuration. 当重定向到的 URL 不在当前应用程序中时，方法会检查属性。The property is checked by the method when the redirection is to a URL that is not in the current application. 如果 为 true，则执行重定向; 否则，浏览器将重定向到属性中定义的页 。If is true, then the redirect is performed; otherwise the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 跨应用程序执行重定向时，必须确保配置节中的几个属性在 `form` 经过身份验证的应用程序中重复。When performing redirects across applications, you must ensure that several of the attributes in the `form` configuration section are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅 [跨应用程序的窗体身份验证](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eb0zx8fc(v=vs.100))。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eb0zx8fc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#8)]

related.span: 跨应用程序进行窗体身份验证

summary.span: 获取或设置请求的重定向 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the redirection URL for the request.

span.span: The URL the request is redirected to when the user is not authenticated.

value.span: 默认值为 login.aspx。

span.span: The default value is login.aspx.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户未经过身份验证或不存在有效的身份验证 cookie 时，属性指定请求的重定向 URL。The property specifies the redirection URL for the request when the user is not authenticated or when no valid authentication cookie exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 。The following code example shows how to access the . 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 获取或设置 Cookie 路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie path.

value.span: 要用于身份验证的 HTTP Cookie 的路径。

span.span: The path of the HTTP cookie to use for authentication.

value.span: 默认值为斜杠 (/)，表示 Web 应用程序的根。

span.span: The default value is a slash (/), which represents the Web-application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示身份验证 cookie 的驻留位置，并与身份验证 cookie 本身一起传输。The property indicates where the authentication cookie resides and is transmitted along with the authentication cookie itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. span.span: Gets or sets the encryption type used to encrypt the cookie.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

value.span: **注意** 如果希望数据验证和加密来帮助保护 cookie，请确保使用此属性的默认值。

span.span: **Note** Be sure to use the default value for this property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie.

value.span: 此选项使用已配置的数据验证算法（基于 ）。

span.span: This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm based on the .

value.span: 如果三重 DES (3DES) 可用并且密钥足够长（48 字节或更长），则使用 3DES 来进行加密。

span.span: Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if available and if the key is long enough (48 bytes or more).

value.span: 若要增强对 Cookie 的保护，您还可以将 设置为 。

span.span: To improve the protection of your cookie, you may also want to set the to .

[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输身份验证信息时是否需要安全套接字层 (SSL) 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection is required when transmitting authentication information.

value.span: 如果需要 SSL 连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is required; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，则 Web 应用程序拒绝不使用 SSL 连接的所有 forms 身份验证请求。If is `true`, a Web application rejects all the forms authentication requests that do not use an SSL connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。The following code example shows how to access the property Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证可调过期。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication sliding expiration.

value.span: 如果启用可调过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为，则 `true` 身份验证 cookie 有效的时间间隔将重置为过期 属性值。When the is set to `true`, the time interval during which the authentication cookie is valid is reset to the expiration property value. 如果用户在超时过期一半后浏览，就会发生这种情况。This happens if the user browses after half of the timeout has expired. 例如，如果使用可调过期将过期时间设置为20分钟，用户可以在下午2:00 访问该站点，并收到设置为在 2:20 PM 过期的 cookie。For example, if you set an expiration of 20 minutes by using sliding expiration, a user can visit the site at 2:00 PM and receive a cookie that is set to expire at 2:20 PM. 仅当用户在下午2:10 日后访问站点时才会更新过期。The expiration is only updated if the user visits the site after 2:10 PM. 如果用户在下午2:09 访问站点，则不会更新 cookie，因为没有超过过期时间的一半。If the user visits the site at 2:09 PM, the cookie is not updated because half of the expiration time has not passed. 如果用户等待了12分钟，则在下午2:21 访问站点，cookie 将过期。If the user then waits 12 minutes, visiting the site at 2:21 PM, the cookie will be expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode TicketCompatibilityMode { System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对于票证到期日期使用协调世界时 (UTC) 还是本地时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date.

value.span: 票证到期日期兼容模式。

span.span: The ticket expiration-date compatibility mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为本地时间，由 枚举值表示。The default value is local time as expressed by the enumeration value. ## Examples [用于身份验证的窗体元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）forms Element for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8163b8b5-ea6c-46c8-b5a9-c4c3de31c0b3)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Timeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证超时。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication time-out.

value.span: 以分钟为单位的时间量，经过该时间间隔后身份验证便会过期。

span.span: The amount of time in minutes after which the authentication expires.

value.span: 默认值为 30 分钟。

span.span: The default value is 30 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 请参阅类主题中的代码示例 ，了解如何获取部分。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section.
